programme.title: The Haitian refugees enter America
programme.short_synopsis: The history of immigration to New York and the impact of new Haitian refugees.
programme.medium_synopsis: The US government allows the Haitian refugees held at Guantanamo Bay to enter the US and considering the chequered history of immigration into New York.
